content: Does anybody know of any examples or have any insights into best practices for using the Claim object to make a request for prior-auth information. For my particular use case I would only need to collect the state and cpt code of the service being requested and I'm having a hard time determining whether A) the claim object is the right request type to use and B) what fields I should map my required fields(state,cpt code) to.

Brian,
does this help at all?
stream:implementers topic:Prior+Authorization+Related+attributes
Mary Kay

Brian,
does this help at all?
stream:implementers topic:Prior+Authorization+Related+attributes
Mary Kay

Yes that was very helpful. Thanks a lot. Do you know if there are any examples of this out on the web anywhere?
